newsitem.title: SPAIN: Spanish bonds close lower after roll-over day.
newsitem.headline: Spanish bonds close lower after roll-over day.

text.p: 1615 GMT - Bonos erased all early gains, ending lower on the last trading day for the December 10-year future contract
* Dec future 112.20 vs 112.22 at Friday's close
* March future 111.60 vs 111.81 at Friday's close
